data.title: mike brewer – Brown Car Guy
data.meta_description: Posts about mike brewer written by Shahzad Sheikh
data.text:
I just completed four days working at the British Motor Show in Farnborough

Just completed working four-days at the British Motor Show, 17-20 August 2023 at Farnborough International Exhibition Centre. Here’s part 1 and 2 of my walk around videos (shot the first on Day 1, and the second on Day 3). Read my preview of the show here.

Continue reading “The British Motor Show 2023” →

Carnage and Motoring Mayhem with Mike Brewer, AutoAlex, Curtis Pritchard, AdamC, Ratarossa, Sam Hard & More!

A taste of what’s to come at The British Motor Show next month – we had a go at Car Football with a host of TV and YouTube stars and Influencers including, Mike Brewer of Wheeler Dealers, Alex Kersen @AutoalexCars Curtis Pritchard @brostorquesupercars , Adam C @AdamC3046 , Scott of @Ratarossa , Sam Hard @Hardupgarage , plus @MotorAddicts and Paul Swift. No giant inflatable balls, Ford Fiestas or Vauxhall Corsas were hurt during the filming of this. Just kidding! They were mercilessly butchered! Huge crazy fun! And an amazing line-up of automotive who’s who!

Continue reading “British Motor Show: Car Football” →

I chat to the Godfather of Car Restoration shows

Interview with the legendary Mike Brewer of Wheeler Dealers recorded yesterday while behind-the-scenes of a promo film being made for this year’s The British Motor Show. Mike Brewer talks about car shows and events, and of course Wheeler Dealers and how he’s involved in most motoring TV shows!

Continue reading “Mike Brewer on The British Motor Show & Wheeler Dealers” →
